node.title: Unfinished Business: A Conversation with Our World Church Leaders
node.description: In this special Sabbath afternoon feature, we will sit down and visit heart-to-heart and face-to-face with church leaders from around the globe.  Our eyes will be opened and our hearts deeply stirred as we learn more of the challenges they face, the obstacles before them, and the great needs that still remain.  Don’t miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to hear from these world division presidents of the Seventh-day Adventist Church during these thought-provoking discussions.
